background_context.situation: Joined Santa Barbara Newcomer's Club approximately six weeks ago.
background_context.environment: Participating in a community club to meet new people.
background_context.constraints: Limited familiarity with the club's website and app.

goals_motivations.drives: Desire to connect with new people and integrate into the community.
goals_motivations.achievements: Wants to make the most of club events and activities.

behaviors_patterns.current_work_style: Primarily uses the app for event management.
behaviors_patterns.habits: Participates in club events and engages with the website to explore options.

pain_points_frustrations.obstacles: Difficulty in navigating the app to find committee contacts and event details.
pain_points_frustrations.what_does_not_work: Complexity in accessing information about events and committee chairs.

needs_desires.life_better: A more intuitive app and website that improves navigation and access to information.
needs_desires.looking_for: Easier ways to filter events and contact committee chairs.

attitudes_beliefs.mental_models: Believes that the website is functional but can be improved.
attitudes_beliefs.preferences: Prefers list views over calendar views for event organization.
attitudes_beliefs.values: Values clear communication and ease of use in community platforms.

technical_comfort.tools_used: Uses the Santa Barbara Newcomer's Club app and website.
technical_comfort.technical_abilities: Moderate; comfortable with basic navigation but struggles with complex features.
technical_comfort.learning_preferences: Learns by engaging with the app and website, tends to skip lengthy reading materials.

quotes: I thought the signing up process was really quite easy.
I don't love the calendar view. I find that the font's smaller.
It's a pretty terrific organization. It's just such a neat way to meet people.
